settings.headline: Walk In Comfort
settings.body: Our customer Brian writes: "A revelation in walking. My Hubbards fit like a sock and I feel like I am barefoot. Springy, a wide rounded toe box, and a solid sole for concrete or trail—these shoes have hardly left my feet since I got them. What I love best is that I forget I have them on."

settings.headline: Genuine Leather
settings.body: We use only the finest materials in our craft. No detail is too small. We obsess over every batch of leather, every lining, and every stitch.

settings.headline: Podiatrist Recommended
settings.body: Removable memory foam insoles provide extra cushioning or allow you to use your own orthotics. Customer proven to reduce pain.

settings.headline: Hubbard Comfort System
settings.body: We took premium materials and added arch support, memory foam insoles, and a cushy cupsole to put a spring in your step.

settings.description: These sneakers are made for walking. Where will your Hubbards take you?
Walk in style with men’s dress sneakers that are engineered for comfort.
Look forward to blue skies and new endeavors with these boat shoes for men. Slip into a pair for boating and wandering through coastal towns.
A classic Italian driver moccasin design. Embrace your free spirit with these stylish walking shoes for travel.

settings.headline: 30 Day Happiness Guarantee
settings.body: Give your new Hubbards a 30-day walk test. If you are not delighted by their comfort, we’ll refund your purchase.

settings.headline: Trade-Up
settings.body: $50 off a new pair of Hubbards when you donate your old shoes –any brand– to someone in need.
